data.title: Ian Simpson-Shelton - 2011 - Baseball
data.meta_description: Ian Simpson-Shelton (8) 1B  - 2010: CAC All-Academic Team ... started all 31 games played in ... hit .239 with 22 hits, 11 RBI, and 8 runs scored ... season-best
data.text:
2010: CAC All-Academic Team ... started all 31 games played in ... hit .239 with 22 hits, 11 RBI, and 8 runs scored ... season-best 2 hits twice ... went 2-for-4 with 2 runs vs. Gallaudet ... drove in 2 runs vs. Randolph-Macon ... .981 fielding percentage in 258 chances ... helped turn 21 double plays.

2009: Played in 12 games with eight starts ... batted .222 with 2 triples and 1 home run ... scored 7 runs while adding 8 RBI ... career-high 5 RBI at Gallaudet ... career-best 3 hits at Washington (Md.) [game 2] ... .984 fielding percentage in 62 chances.

2008: Saw action in 12 games with five starts ... went 2-for-3 at Washington (Md.) ... scored 4 runs and batted in 3 ... drove in 2 runs at Gallaudet [game 2] ... .969 fielding percentage in 32 chances.

DeMatha Catholic HS: 2007 graduate ... posted a .417 average and 19 RBI as a junior ... second team All-Washington Catholic Athletic Conference ... batted .300 as a senior ... member, National Honor Society, Black Student Union and DeMatha Putt-Putt Club ... SGA treasurer.
